hadiths.text: It was narrated that Bushair bin Al-Muhajir said:"I asked Al-Hasan about juice that has been cooked. He said: 'That which has been cooked until two-third of it has gone and one-third is left

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يَجُوزُ شُرْبُهُ مِنَ الطِّلاَءِ وَمَا لاَ يَجُوزُ
chapter.eng-name: What Kind of Thickened Grape Juice is Permissible to Drink and What Kind is Not Permitte
